# PR12494 - Tractor Tender for Parks Canada

**Notice Number,** RTB692867:

## Tender Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services on behalf of Parks Canada Agency (PC) is soliciting bids for the supply of a tractor for operational purposes.

### Key Details

* **Tender Closing Date:** April 11, 2024, at 14h00 HAE
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4431965849
* **Notice Link:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18976655?extsite=MTg5NzY2NTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Requirement Description

Parks Canada requires a tractor to navigate restricted areas such as hiking trails and camping loops. The tractor will be used to transport gravel, sand, and stone to hard-to-reach locations inaccessible by motorized vehicles. Additionally, it will be used for lawn mowing and snow removal with a rear-mounted blower.

## Amendment to Response Deadline

Please note that the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time is amended. All required documents and bid submissions must be submitted by April 11, 2024, at 14h00 HAE. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

## Consideration of Indigenous Business

This tender notice is set-aside for Indigenous business as per Doc#4461316475_PR12494_Stream2 (General - Open to All). Advenant that Stream 1 for Indigenous business is not conclusive, Stream 2 for General will be considered.

## Contracting Entity and End User Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), represented by Parks Canada Agency (PC)
* **End User Entity:** Parks Canada Agency (PC)
